unnormalised: Employee retention is crucial in today's competitive market. We at Tata Consultancy Services are focusing on initiatives like upskilling programs starting 20/07/2024 & better work-life balance. Considering performance appraisals scheduled for 10/10/2024 at 14:00 hrs, let's remember "Atithi Devo Bhava" & treat employees well. We need to reduce attrition by Q4 2024, ensuring a happier workforce across India.
normalised: Employee retention is crucial in today's competitive market. We at T A T A Consultancy Services are focusing on initiatives like upskilling programs starting twentieth july two thousand and twenty four and better work-life balance. Considering performance appraisals scheduled for tenth october two thousand and twenty four at two P M, let's remember "Atithi Devo Bhava" and treat employees well. We need to reduce attrition by Q four two thousand and twenty four, ensuring a happier workforce across India.
